description: Least positive multiple of n written in base 4 using only 0 and 1.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
mathematica: lpm4[n_]:=Module[{k=1},While[Rest[Most[DigitCount[n k,4]]]!={0,0},k++]; FromDigits[IntegerDigits[n k,4]]]; Array[lpm4,40] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 22 2012 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
